item.title: R Resources
item.description: Articles To Read https://www.propublica.org/article/machine-bias-risk-assessments-in-criminal-sentencing https://www.propublica.org/article/politic-il-insider-chicago-gang-database https://medium.com/the-mission/the-best-books-to-understand-complex-systems-eb186610dff7 Blogs Cathy O’Neil Blog Data Science Central http://www.bytemining.com/ http://www.datascience.university/ https://www.r-bloggers.com/ http://www.statsoc.org.au/ Online Courses List of Machine Learning Courses BerkeleyX - Foundations of Data Science Coursera - John Hopkin’s University - Data Science Specialisation The Data Scientists’s Toolbox (Complete) R Programming Getting and Cleaning Data Exploratory Data Analysis Reproducible Research Statistical Inference Regression Models Practical Machine Learning Developing Data Products R Markdown Creating Websites with R Markdown (Currently Reading) R Markdown Reference Guide LaTeX General Data Science Doing Data Science Columbia - Applied Data Science Data for Good Initiatives Driven Data Data Kind Learning R The Art of R Programming - Norman Matloff (No Starch Press) R for Everyone: Advanced Analytics and Graphics - Jared Lander (Addison-Wesley) R in a Nutshell - Joseph Adler (O’Reilly) Learning Python Learning Python - Mark Lutz and David Ascher (O’Reilly) Python for Data Analysis - Wes McKinney (O’Reilly) Math Linear Algebra and Its Applications - Gilbert Strang (Cengage Learning) Convex Optimization - Stephen Boyd and Lieven Vandenberghe (Cambridge University Press) A First Course in Probability - Sheldon Ross (Academic Press) A career in statistics: beyond the numbers - Gerald J.
